name: Stepper
desc: A control that performs increment and decrement actions.

items.name: init<V>(value: Binding<V>, step: V.Stride, label: () -> Label, onEditingChanged: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a stepper configured to increment or decrement a binding to a value using a step value you provide.

items.name: init<V>(LocalizedStringKey, value: Binding<V>, step: V.Stride, onEditingChanged: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a stepper with a title key and configured to increment and decrement a binding to a value and step amount you provide.

items.name: init<S, V>(S, value: Binding<V>, step: V.Stride, onEditingChanged: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a stepper with a title and configured to increment and decrement a binding to a value and step amount you provide.

items.name: init<V>(value: Binding<V>, in: ClosedRange<V>, step: V.Stride, label: () -> Label, onEditingChanged: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a stepper configured to increment or decrement a binding to a value using a step value and within a range of values you provide.

items.name: init<V>(LocalizedStringKey, value: Binding<V>, in: ClosedRange<V>, step: V.Stride, onEditingChanged: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a stepper instance that increments and decrements a binding to a value, by a step size and within a closed range that you provide.

items.name: init<S, V>(S, value: Binding<V>, in: ClosedRange<V>, step: V.Stride, onEditingChanged: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a stepper instance that increments and decrements a binding to a value, by a step size and within a closed range that you provide.

items.name: init(label: () -> Label, onIncrement: (() -> Void)?, onDecrement: (() -> Void)?, onEditingChanged: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a stepper instance that performs the closures you provide when the user increments or decrements the stepper.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, onIncrement: (() -> Void)?, onDecrement: (() -> Void)?, onEditingChanged: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a stepper that uses a title key and executes the closures you provide when the user clicks or taps the stepper’s increment and decrement buttons.

items.name: init<S>(S, onIncrement: (() -> Void)?, onDecrement: (() -> Void)?, onEditingChanged: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a stepper using a title string and that executes closures you provide when the user clicks or taps the stepper’s increment or decrement buttons.

items.desc: The content and behavior of the view.
